jobs.Title: C# Lead Developer
jobs.Summary:
Role

Exciting opportunity to build something very cool with backend development in C#; building APIs to collect, synthesise and expose unstructured data. 3 months contract with possible extension. 

  • Immediate start
  • One of the top multi national client with great friendly people to work with
  • Use the latest technology in development and delivery framework
  • Good rates and additional perks that are usually not available for contractors

 

Skills

The applicant should have knowledge and hands-on experience in the following areas/technologies. We completely understand that no one knows everything but the successful applicant will have at least 5 ticks from the list below:

  • .Net Core 2.x and ASP .Net Core [Mandatory]
  • SQL (languages not MSSQL product)
  • Unit test with Moq or similar mocking framework
  • REST API & HTTP knowledge
  • Azure PaaS Services (App Services and/or Functions), or Azure general computing (such as VMs, CosmosDB, SQL server etc)
  • Git
  • Powershell or any other scripting skill â€“ you know how to package your application with a command line interface
  • CICD (Azure DevOps, TeamCity, Bamboo or any other popular technologies/platforms)

 Following skills are nice to have but not mandatory

  • Azure Cosmos DB
  • Knowledge in Graph DB (Neo4J or Azure Cosmos Gremlin)
  • GraphQL API
  • TypeScript and ES6
  • SpecFlow
  • Azure 
  • OAuth 2, OpenID and SAML

 

BENEFITS & PERKS

TechGrid NZ is different from the usual contract agencies. You will receive 

  • Excellent rates
  • Professional indemnity insurance taken care by the company
  • Public Liability insurance taken care by the company
  • Accounting Services for free.
  • Paid time for up to 3 days per year for training after 6 months of contract
  • Paid time for up to 3 days for bereavement
  • Provide support to succeed at work for free. (Review of the work if needed, coaching sessions with experienced professionals on the same line of work) 
  • Regular Performance Feedback sessions if needed for professional development 
  • Opportunity to share and create with well connected TechGrid network of professionals. 

 

HOW TO APPLY

Click the APPLY button and include your resume. For further information please email hass@techgrid.nz or call 0272188918

 

NOTE to overseas enquiries and non-NZ residents:
We welcome international enquiries however please make sure you are legally entitled to work in New Zealand and can make yourself available to start work within 4 weeks of the application. 

Others will not be responded to unfortunately.
